data.author: Albert Einstein
data.quote: Anyone who has never made a mistake has never tried anything new.

data.author: Nike, Inc.
data.quote: Just do it.

data.author: Samuel Johnson
data.quote: Clear your mind of can't.

data.author: Albert Einstein
data.quote: In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity.

data.author: James Cash (J.C.) Penney
data.quote: Long-range goals keep you from being frustrated by short-term failures.

data.author: Henry David Thoreau
data.quote: The question is not what you look at, but what you see.

data.author: Dr APJ Abdul Kalam
data.quote: Man needs difficulties in life because they are necessary to enjoy the success.

data.author: Dr APJ Abdul Kalam
data.quote: Excellence is a continuous process and not an accident.

data.author: Dr APJ Abdul Kalam
data.quote:
All Birds find shelter during a rain.
But Eagle avoids rain by flying above the Clouds.

data.author: Dr APJ Abdul Kalam
data.quote: I Don’t take rest after your first victory because if you fail in second, more lips are waiting to say that your first victory was just luck.

data.author: Dr APJ Abdul Kalam
data.quote: Failure will never overtake me if my definition to succeed is strong enough.

data.author: Dr APJ Abdul Kalam
data.quote:
If you fail, never give up because F.A.I.L. means “First Attempt In Learning”.
End is not the end, if fact E.N.D. means “Effort Never Dies”. If you get No as an answer, remember N.O. means “Next Opportunity”.
So Let’s be positive.

data.author: Dr APJ Abdul Kalam
data.quote: It is very easy to defeat someone, but it is very hard to win someone.

data.author: Dr APJ Abdul Kalam
data.quote: “Unless India stands up to the world, no one will respect us. In this world, fear has no place. Only strength respects strength.

data.author: Dr APJ Abdul Kalam
data.quote: I will not be presumptuous enough to say that my life can be a role model for anybody; but some poor child living in an obscure place in an underprivileged social setting may find a little solace in the way my destiny has been shaped. It could perhaps help such children liberate themselves from the bondage of their illusory backwardness and hopelessness?

data.author: Dr APJ Abdul Kalam
data.quote: Thinking should become your capital asset, no matter whatever ups and downs you come across in your life.

data.author: Dr APJ Abdul Kalam
data.quote: Thinking is progress. Non-thinking is stagnation of the individual, organisation and the country. Thinking leads to action. Knowledge without action is useless and irrelevant. Knowledge with action, converts adversity into prosperity.

data.author: Dr APJ Abdul Kalam
data.quote: My message, especially to young people is to have courage to think differently, courage to invent, to travel the unexplored path, courage to discover the impossible and to conquer the problems and succeed. These are great qualities that they must work towards. This is my message to the young people.

data.author: Dr APJ Abdul Kalam
data.quote: While children are struggling to be unique, the world around them is trying all means to make them look like everybody else.

data.author: Dr APJ Abdul Kalam
data.quote: For me, there are two types of people: the young and the experienced.
